name: Super Meat Man
description:
This project was made in GODOT Game Engine, written in GDScript and with various assets from the Itch.io store (free ones off course). Super Meat Man is a platformer game inspired in Super Meat Boy. It has 9 levels designed by me and 1 looping song, you better like it.

Tileset for the enviroment and background is Inca Game Tileset (https://kronbits.itch.io/inca-game-assets)
